DataSource.name: DsLoMyPhaseForCustomerTask
DataSource.QueryCondition: Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c.Mobile_App_Domain__c = 'DomSvcIssuePhase' AND Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c.Object__c = 'cgcloud__Account_Task__c' AND CASE WHEN #custTaskTemplate# IN ('Price Feature', 'Sampling Event', 'Engagement') THEN Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c.Text_Language_1__c IN ('Not Started','In Progress','Committed','Completed','Declined') WHEN #custTaskTemplate# = 'Display' THEN Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c.Text_Language_1__c IN ('Pending', 'Final', 'Cancelled') WHEN #custTaskTemplate# = 'Objective' THEN Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c.Text_Language_1__c IN ('In Progress', 'Committed', 'Completed') WHEN #custTaskTemplate# = 'Feature' THEN Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c.Text_Language_1__c IN ('In Progress', 'Completed') ELSE 0 END
